example.text: Norfolk Southern has a long way to go to make things right for the people of East Palestine. This new fund is an important step in repairing the damage done to the community and making whole those homeowners whose property values have declined due to no fault of their own.… [[url]]

I’m proud to have secured a deal in writing with the CEO of Norfolk Southern for the people of East Palestine. People who live near the crash site will not lose value should they chose to sell their homes. [[url]]
